title: Normal
short_description: For small outdoor games,workshops,seminar or career planning events. Where maximum capacity is 300 people. Venue can be indoor or outdoor. Our volunteer team will assist you in planning your event.

title: Premium
short_description: In this type of package medium range workshops, hackathon and career planning events. Where maximum capacity is 300 people. Venue can be indoor or outdoor. Venue can be indoor or Outdoor as client wishes.

title: Platinum
short_description: In this type of package medium to large range seminar, workshops, hackathon, and career planning events. Where maximum capacity is 1500 people. Venue can be indoor or outdoor. Venue can be indoor or Outdoor as client wishes.

title: Diamond
short_description: In this type of package any range workshops,indoor games, meetup, seminar,robotic competions, hackathon and career planning events. Where maximum capacity of people is as client request. Venue is mostly indoor. Networking and technical support is also provided.
Food: Full day meals & lots of snacks
